message.content:
cs.CL, cs.AI, cs.LG, cs.IR, cs.NE 

This paper deals with the development of a corpus and system for automated data-to-text news generation, which falls under the category of natural language processing (NLP). Specifically, the paper focuses on generating sports news reports, which involves understanding and interpreting game statistics and other background knowledge. Therefore, the most likely sub-category is cs.CL (Computation and Language), which deals with NLP and related topics. Additionally, the paper involves the use of machine learning techniques for generating text, which suggests that it could also fall under cs.AI (Artificial Intelligence) and cs.LG (Machine Learning). The paper also mentions the use of information retrieval techniques for selecting relevant information, which could place it under cs.IR (Information Retrieval). Finally, the paper involves the use of neural networks for text generation, which could also place it under cs.NE (Neural and Evolutionary Computing).
